page.title: 11Lifestyles-Nth Featherstone
page.content: The majority of the people live in owner occupied semi-detached or terraced housing.Most take their holidays in England,the East coast being very popular.They take one or two main holidays per year but do spend weekends away in their caravans. Those who do not have a car are in the minority and a large majority either owned or rented a video.On average those interviewed went out three nights per week and Public Houses and Working Mens Clubs were the most popular forms of entertainment,eating out,espcially at weekends,however,was popular.Very few people actively take part in any sports but many women did attend Keep Fit classes. Most households had at least one full time wage earner ,manual work being the most common but many women did do some form of part time work.
